products.name: Web Development Masterclass

products.name: Python Programming Bundle
products.description: From basics to advanced topics, data science, and machine learning. Includes Jupyter notebooks and practice exercises.

products.name: UI/UX Design Resource Pack
products.description: Professional design templates, wireframe kits, and UI components. Perfect for designers and developers.

products.name: Mobile App Development

products.name: Data Science Toolkit

products.name: Cloud Computing Essentials

products.description: Comprehensive guide to AI fundamentals, neural networks, and deep learning. Includes TensorFlow and PyTorch examples.

products.name: DevOps Resource Pack

products.name: Blockchain Development
